The one card layout is great as a starter for you to get a feeling of what it is you want to ask tarot. It will help you to focus on what is important for you right now. This can also be used after a complex layout to more specifically answer an uncomplicated question or to give more infomation about a card in the complex layout that you are unsure of.
Where you are now. This can point to a particular situation you find yourself in now or a quality that you need to concentrate on for your development right now.
